page.title: 14RECREATION IN SOUTH LINCS
page.content: Recreational facilities are limited to mainly outdoor pursuits. Nature trails can be enjoyed in the woodlands and across some farmland. There are a few remaining rights of way for walking. One of the farms operates a riding school providing facilities for riding holidays, as well as catering for local individuals. One afternoon a week mentally handicapped patients from St. Peter's Hospital, Bourne are able to ride there. The owner of the riding school breeds ponies, race horses and hunters. At present he has fifty horses in his stables.
